sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with xue han 血汗 , blood sweat. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 27: 汗血候：肝藏血， 心之液為汗。言肝心俱傷於邪，故血從膚腠而出也 , “Signs of sweating blood : The liver stores the blood. The liquid associated with the heart is sweat. That is to say, if the liver and heart are simultaneously affected by evil, blood will leave through the dermal interstices”.
